artist: Painter: After Domenichino; Publisher: S. Gans Publishing Co.
description: self portrait facing right and looking left; curly hair and small beard; wearomg cloak and jacket with many buttons; white collar
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

on sheet in black: [DOMENICHINO/ FROM THE PORTRAIT PAINTED BY HIMSELF/ London, Published by S. Gans, 22 Southampton St, Strand/ 1828]; in pencil on sheet: [1-354]
title: Portrait of Domenichino
